committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to repeal the provision of the Military Selective Service Act prohibiting the furnishing of Federal financial assistance for post-secondary education to persons who have not complied with the registration requirement under that Act.

summary.text: Amends the Military Selective Service Act to repeal the prohibition against providing student loans for persons who were required to but have not registered under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the provision of the Military Selective Service Act prohibiting the furnishing of Federal financial assistance for post-secondary education to persons who have not complied with the registration requirement under that Act.
